hiveArticle.title: Let's Discuss - Do you like to Travel to the same place again
hiveArticle.body:
As the Question says, do you like to Travel to the same place again, what I meant is you might have traveled in a place, city or country, would you like to travel there again to explore more.

My answer to this question is yes, and I will list out my reasons for it.

1. On any visit due to time constraint, you might not be able to travel to all the places, so I would like to travel to that place again so that I will visit the previously missed places. 

2. Adding to the above point I will also try to visit the place which I liked the most. For example, I really like a spot in Coorg where the sunrise is awesome so I would also like to go to that place again if I am traveling to Coorg again.

3. The next time to travel to that place gives me that extra time to just relax and enjoy the place rather than hurrying to see all the places.

4. Now I will also consider the different season to travel to that place to get the different flavor of the different season.
